ingredients.ingredient: 1 pound red potatoes, thinly sliced on a mandoline

cookingTips: Use a mandoline for consistent chip thickness to ensure even cooking
Soak sliced potatoes in vinegar for 15-20 minutes, then pat completely dry
Work in batches to avoid overcrowding the air fryer basket
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide me through making homemade salt and vinegar potato chips in an air fryer.
